price: Hënës i kemi caktuar faza; ajo përditë hahet e bëhet si rremi i përkulur i hurmës.
arabic: وَٱلۡقَمَرَ قَدَّرۡنَٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلۡعُرۡجُونِ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wal-qamara qaddarnāhu manāzila ḥattā ʿāda kal-ʿur'jūni al-qadīmi
